vocabinfos.mediumDef:
to gather, collect, gather stubble or sticks
§ to gather, collect, gather stubble or sticks
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) qal   reunir, recolectar; (b) po.   recolectar, juntar; (c) hitp.   reunir, recolectar
